content:
> If you were the only person on the planet, no one will ever see the things you do or know about it or clap for you, want would you want to do?
For me, it's walk. I would get up and go. I would travel not for seeing places or things. It's only for moving. I would listen to nature. I'd go through cities. I'd steal to survive or build a garden or whatever but none of that is important. I might build a shack or break into someone's home. I might take a bike but I wouldn't take a car. I want to get around under my own power.
